txt.en:
'Some days ago our bravest scout leave to spy upon the Orcs as they travel through the pass.

'He sent message that he found something worse - a dark cleft filled with evil bat-creatures he has not seen before... but that is last we hear from him.

'Can you find our scout? See that he is safe? He had small camp hidden high up along wall of the valley to the east - if he lives you find him there.'

'Chief Tuokki send you to help me? Could have sent someone bigger, I think...but I am hurt and will take your help gladly!\n\n'Evil things gather here in Ram Dúath. More evil than Orcs, more evil than Men who serve dark lords. I shall tell you of them!'

Chief Tuokki has asked you to seek out one of the Earth-kin -- a scout who was sent into the next valley to spy upon a band of deadly bat-women who have made lair somewhere in the hidden clefts of the Ram Dúath. The Chief informed you the scout had a small camp hidden high up along the wall of the valley to the East.
